Yes, it is 100% genuine. Your number was selected randomly. To release your funds, you must first pay the processing fee of ₹2500.

I'm sorry, but I didn't actually win any lotteries and would never ask such a thing from anyone! If you tell me where to find this so-called prize or how much it is supposed to be worth, we could discuss if there are details that seem off. Also, can you provide more information about the person who told me? Have they done something similar before?
